name: Farm Fresh Fish
description:
Just a couple of fish taking revenge on humans a nice scenic trip after completing mechanic school.

Controls

  • Left Stick / WASD / Arrow Keys - Move
  • Right Stick / Mouse Scroll Wheel - Cast/Reel Hook
  • B Button / R Key / Right Click - Release from Hook
  • A Button / Right Trigger / Left Click - Collect Catch from Hook

Credits

  • Developed in 72 hours for Minijam 91: UFO by MajorPest and ReinLol
  • Music by Yerzmyey and Doomcloud
